title: "Financial Inclusion and Subjective Well Being"
format: html
---

# Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(lavaan)
```

# Data Cleaning
```{r}
wm <- read_sav("wm.sav") |> 
  filter(zone %in% c(4,5,6))
```

# SEM
```{r}
#structural equation model
model <- '
  #measurement model
    awareness =~ FN1A + FN1B + FN1C + FN1D + FN1E + FN1F + FN1G + FN1H + FN1I + FN1J + FN1K + FN1L
    usage =~ FN2 + FN4A + FN4C + FN4D + FN4E + FN4F + FN4G + FN4H + FN4X + FN4NR + FN5
    FI =~ awareness + usage
    SW =~ LS1 + LS2 + LS3 + LS4
  #regressions
    SW ~ FI
  #SW ~ FI + welevel + insurance + zone + MA6 + HH6 
    FN4C ~~ FN4NR
    FN1H ~~ FN1I
    FN1K ~~ FN1L
    FN4H ~~ FN4X
    FN4E ~~ FN4NR
    FN4C ~~ FN4E
    FN4D ~~ FN4E
    FN4D ~~ FN4NR
    FN1D ~~ FN1G
    FN1J ~~ FN1L
    FN4C ~~ FN4D
    FN1J ~~ FN1K
    LS1 ~~ LS2
    LS2 ~~ LS3
    FN1A ~~ FN1J
    FN1A ~~ FN1B
    FN1C ~~ FN1D
    FN1D ~~ FN1I
    FN1B ~~ FN1E
    FN4F ~~ FN4G
'
fit <- sem(model, data = wm)
summary(fit, standardized = TRUE)
modindices(fit, sort = TRUE, maximum.number = 5)
fitMeasures(fit, c("cfi","rmsea","srmr"))
```
```{r}
library(semPlot)
lavaanPlot(fit, what = "std", layout = "circle")

```
